name: LibreOffice-NA-DVD

screenshots.caption: Install page screenshot showing the different operating systems, etc.
one of the DVD label options

short_description:
This project was created as a way to provide a DVD .iso file for the various version of LibreOffice.  It was also created to make physical DVDs to be sent to those that do not have Internet access that would allow such a large file to be downloaded.

The project's web site is http://libreoffice-na.us
There you will be able to see the web site versions of the ISO files that are hosted here.  Sometimes I will have the ISO files online before I have the same versions reflected in the web site version[s].  The DVDs are browser based.

Under the "Files" tab, there are currently two sections.  4.2.x versions of LibreOffice, and 4.3.x versions of LibreOffice, ISO files.  The above green tab shows only the last file uploaded, even though there are several versions available to be downloaded.

The official international LibreOffice website is http://LibreOffice.com
summary: A DVD .iso project for LibreOffice in North America
